body_html:
@ebrevdo: maybe you can help @alrojo (and perhaps me) here. If it seems too complicated to talk through github, I'll meet you offline.

Maybe, let's look at the two functions loop_fn_train (line 39) and loop_fn (for eval, line 87) in this file. Are these good starting points to talk?

body:
@ebrevdo: maybe you can help @alrojo  (and perhaps me) here. If it seems too complicated to talk through github, I'll meet you offline.

Maybe, let's look at the two functions `loop_fn_train` (line 39) and `loop_fn` (for eval, line 87) in this [file](https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/decoder_fn.py). Are these good starting points to talk?
